alert.note: Alert for Jones; Lyman (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued January 31 at 2:05AM MST until January 31 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR JONES AND LYMAN COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA... The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 1 PM this afternoon to 6 PM CST this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In South Dakota, Jones and Lyman. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 18 percent. * IMPACTS... A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures could contribute to critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
